name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 12, it was reported online that the accounts of riders who participated in the protest were banned on the grounds of "unreasonable interference with operating order." According to platform rules, riders who organize, incite, or participate in strikes, sit-ins, and other acts that interfere with the order of government agencies, enterprises, and social order will be punished by restrictions on receiving orders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hangzhou West Lake Police issued a police report
A male deliveryman named Wang was stopped by security guards because he stepped on the railing and broke it during the delivery process. He knelt down because he was worried about affecting other orders, which caused a crowd to gather. Currently, the people involved are being investigated according to law, and will be dealt with according to law in the future based on the investigation results.
